tool.name: Label Spectral Data with Sample Identifiers
tool.description: Annotate spectral datafiles, with reporter ions and their sample identifiers, for isotope-label workflows, and their sample identifiers, for label-free workflows.
tool.command: cp -f ${input} data.psm && ln -s ${samples} samples.csv && ${__tool_directory__}/../lib/CPTAC-CDAP-Reports/sample1 -d data.psm -s samples.csv
